original_text: And on the other side Jordan by Jericho, on the east side of Jordan, were given them out of the tribe of Reuben, Bezer in the wilderness with her suburbs, and Jahzah with her suburbs,
korean_text: 또 요단 건너 동쪽 곧 여리고 맞은편 르우벤 지파 중에서 광야의 베셀과 그 초원과 야사와 그 초원과

sentences.original_text: And on the other side Jordan by Jericho
on the east side of Jordan
were given them out of the tribe of Reuben
Bezer in the wilderness with her suburbs
sentences.korean_translation: 광야에 있는 베셀과 그 부속 마을들이
